title: Moto Spy: Episode One
excerpt: The opening episode from Red Bull.
author: Lewis Phillips
content:
Subscribe to MX Vice on YouTube.

Follow @MXVice on Instagram.

The world's elite supercross racers take their first steps towards the 2020 AMA Supercross Championship. Cooper Webb prepares to go into Anaheim with the weight of the number one plate, while Ken Roczen seeks to finally reach the top step of the podium once again. Meanwhile, the Troy Lee Designs KTM team is rewriting the playbook in the 250 class. – Red Bull

Video: Red Bull Motorsports | Lead Image: Honda Racing Corporation
